name: player career year basic display
description: Test case for basic career year column display
expected_query: select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.career_year as career_year_0, "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "player_seasonlogs" as "t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166" on "t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166"."pid" = "player"."pid" and t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.seas_type = 'REG' and t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.year = 2024 left join "player_seasonlogs" as "t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095" on "t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095"."pid" = "player"."pid" and t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.seas_type = 'REG' and t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.year = 2023 where t400d8fd8d99658efbdbc325edea87166.career_year >= '1' group by player.fname, player.lname, t209f3a217d72274fbedbe4d44e4a5095.career_year, "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 ASC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 10
